```{r}
# Create 5x10 matrix
set.seed(123)
my_matrix <- matrix(sample(1:100, 50, replace = TRUE), nrow = 5, ncol = 10)

# Set Names
colnames(my_matrix) <- c(paste0("cond", 1:5), paste0("ctrl", 1:5))
rownames(my_matrix) <- paste0("gene", 1:5)

# Compute Fold Change (Mean of cond / Mean of ctrl)
cond_cols <- my_matrix[, 1:5]
ctrl_cols <- my_matrix[, 6:10]
fold_change <- rowMeans(cond_cols) / rowMeans(ctrl_cols)

# Show results
data.frame(my_matrix, Fold_Change = fold_change)
```
